topics.body:
"@Carcass Strife":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/5537197663687261ccfa0a00#post_5537197663687261ccfa0a00
I never said I didn't wanna watch AoT or FLCL, in fact I'm very interested in both series, just unmotivated to start.

I made a bet with Toski to see if he could get through Nichijou, and if he did then I would watch AoT/FLCL. I mean I was gonna watch them anyways, but I just wanted to see if he could do it. I don't really care if he doesn't though, now I get to see what I've missed.

Starting with FLCL though because it's shorter and I have the time right now to get through it.
